author: Beth Mole
title: Don’t Panic: The comprehensive Ars Technica guide to the coronavirus [Updated 4/4]
description: This is a fast-moving epidemic—we'll update this guide periodically.
content:
6488 with 597 posters participating
Nearly 1.2 million people have been infected with a new coronavirus that has spread widely from its origin in China over the past few months. Nearly 64,000 have already died. Our comprehensive guide for understanding and n… [+30640 chars]
